description: The Ashikabi controlling the western part of the city. His first name literally means "West" and it is his real name, not a nickname. Despite his rough appearance, he is shown to be overly emotional and protective around his Sekirei almost to the point of embarrassment. His appearance and personality are similar to that of Seo`s and their similarities resulted in them getting into a comical fist fight, after which they gained some respect for each other after the first match of the Third Stage. He rides a motorcycle.
name: Sanada Nishi
